name: Segment
description: Complete control over your customer data with Hull and Segment

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Users to send
private_settings.description: List segments for which to send Users to Segment

private_settings.name: synchronized_properties
private_settings.title: Attributes to send in Users
private_settings.description: *By default, only `email` and `hull_segments` are sent to Segment.com in `analytics.identify()` calls*

private_settings.name: send_events
private_settings.title: Events to send
private_settings.description: *By Default, all events are sent to Segment.com as `analytics.track()` calls. If you specify events above, only those will be sent.*

private_settings.name: forward_events
private_settings.title: Enable forwarding of events received from Segment.com
private_settings.description: ONLY enable this feature when the Write Key is from a different workspace. Read the manual before making any changes; this can result in an endless loop of events.

private_settings.name: synchronized_account_segments
private_settings.title: Accounts to send
private_settings.description: List segments for which to send Account to segment

private_settings.name: synchronized_account_properties
private_settings.title: Attributes to send in Accounts
private_settings.description: *By default, only `domain` is sent to Segment.com in `analytics.group()` calls*

settings.name: write_key
settings.title: Write Key to send data to Segment.com API
settings.description: Find it under Settings > API Keys > Write Key in your Segment.com workspace.

settings.name: ignore_segment_userId
settings.title: Ignore User ID
settings.description: Ignore `userId` received from segment.com, use the email or anonymousId as identifier instead.

settings.name: public_id_field
settings.title: User ID
settings.description: Attribute to use as `userId` in the segment payload. Warning: This can affect your MTUs.

settings.name: public_account_id_field
settings.title: Public Account ID Field
settings.description: Account field to use as the groupId for data sent to segment

settings.name: sending_hero
settings.title: Important Note
settings.headerTemplate: **Users and Accounts are only sent to segment.com when at least one identifier is present, this can be either the `External ID` or one or more `Anonymous IDs`.**

settings.name: handle_pages
settings.title: Handle Page Calls
settings.description: Record whenever a user sees a page of your website.

settings.name: handle_screens
settings.title: Capture Screen Calls
settings.description: Screen calls let you record whenever a user sees a screen on a mobile app.

settings.name: handle_accounts
settings.title: Capture Group Calls
settings.description: Handle incoming group calls. Group calls associate an individual user with a group—be it a company, organization, account, project, team or whatever you come up with. A user can be in multiple groups in segment, however **Hull will handle only one group**. Consecutive group calls will overwrite the attributes in Hull. For further information, please read the Instructions.
